dcterms:creator: Z. Tang
D. Wang
Y. Chen
Q. Chen
dcterms:description: The AP17-OLR database is used for evaluating speech language identification models, containing recordings in 10 languages, including Mandarin, Cantonese, and Japanese, among others. It includes both long and short duration subsets for training and testing.
dcterms:title: AP17-OLR database
